Cluster

Cluster is a set of objects which are 'close' to each other.

A cluster array structure is: [x1, y1, x2, y2, objectIDs]

x1, y1, x2, y2 - edge coordinates:
x2 > x1
y2 > y1
    *------(x2, y2)
    |         |
    |         |
(x1, y1)------*
objectIDs

array with IDs of objects (integers, objects, arrays, anything)
